comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: If so, she would be Mary Margaret Steinkopf. She died 17 February 1933, according to www.thepeerage.com/p23161.htm

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks for the suggestions Richard Arthur Norton and swanq. I going to make another suggestion, that this shows Lady Grace Mackenzie. Lady Grace Mackenzie was a big game hunter who became popular because of the films and photos of her hunting in Africa. Bain has another photo labeled "Lady Mackenzie" which is clearly Grace. You can see it in the Prints & Photographs Online Catalog at www.loc.gov/pictures/item/ggb2006004526/.
